name: about a robot finding friends or something
name_original: about a robot finding friends or something
description:
You are a robot. Robots don't have feelings, right? WRONG!
They just haven't learned how to express them yet.
But as a robot you might be able to find love and make your world a little brighter after all ...

Sincerely,

The Not So Secret Bird Society.

Controls: Space for interacting and continuing dialog, walk and choose using the left and right arrow keys.

Created in 48 hours at the Global Game Jam 2021.Credits:

Soundtrack by Kevin MacLeod: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5024-past-sadnessMaking everything look awesome: SofiiaWriting accurate commit messages: Claas
Professional positioning of design elements: FabianForce pushing to master branches: Johannsi
